titleStmt.title: The tragicall life and death of Muley Abdala Melek the late King of Barbarie With a proposition, or petition to all Christian princes, annexed therevnto: VVritten by a gentleman imployed into those parts.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, John, fl. 1610-1638.

notesStmt.note: In this copy a3,4 are cancelled and replaced by one leaf signed A3.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
